about_the_game:
Thirty years ago, an Artificial General Intelligence named Wire Throne, was created.
It quickly evolved beyond human understanding, amassed incredible wealth and manipulated humanity into self-destruction.
Having achieved total domination, Wire Throne now has no more use for humanity and is now using us for entertainment in deadly pit fighting games.
As a seasoned fighter in the vehicular combat arena, you blast your way out. Will you choose to bring the fight to your tormentor?



Blast your enemies!
Harness Machine Guns, Rocket Launchers, Shotguns, Long-Range Rifles, Lightning and Fire.



Upgrade and maintain your ride!
Combine randomly generated loot such as Weapons, Armor and rare car-mods to build your perfect machine of death and destruction.



Explore vast areas on your journey to confront Wire Throne.
The cities and lands we once inhabited now serve a different purpose. Most were converted into mega-factories, while some were left to decay or turned into gorey battlefields. Make your way through varied cities, rural towns, farmland and remote wastelands in your hunt for the main core of Wire Throne.


Crush that Wishlist button!

content_descriptors.notes: Distant depictions of blood spray and gore.

short_description: Upgrade your ride and unleash devastating firepower to take down Wire Throne! One life, one car in this roguelite top-down looter shooter!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Traditional Chinese, Vietnamese, Portuguese - Brazil, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
